name: Solar Siege (itch)
description:
Seeking the destruction of our star, destroy the advancing bricks with the latest in defense technology: the Photovoltaic Adjustable Defense-Driven Livable Exoship!

Use the P.A.D.D.L.E.'s Solar-Powered Thruster technology to perform slap-shots, reach far-off Orbs, and ensure victory against the ever-encroaching stack!

Alongside arcade-style brick-smashin' gameplay, try out all four distinct levels of difficulty, or try Endless-mode to defend the day away!

Note from Developer-

Solar Siege was made as my first-steps into both Unity, and 3D games as a whole, having come from GameMaker Studio for the most part. All music, art, and code was done by myself with help from my fiancé rutrine. I hope you enjoy it, this project was a ton of fun and I learned a lot from doing it! 

-MasterArrow
